summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Floss Picks Review Date: 2019/08/18 Store: BEOKREU Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 4.92 x 1.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '745679748517'} Review Text: This Floss Picks Dental Floss product contains a total of 200 dental floss. There are 4 separate bags. Each bag contains 50 dental floss. Each bag is resealable.

I have used these particular dental floss at various times of the day for the past 7 days. So far, not one dental floss has broken or become frayed. The floss moves between my teeth in a smooth manner.

This dental floss has no flavor.

I used these dental floss at home, and took a bag with me to work so that I can discreetly used them after eating lunch.

This dental floss works as intended to help me keep my teeth and gums healthy. Review Title: Dental floss moves easily between my teeth. None has broken or frayed so far. No flavor. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls 100% Acetone Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, Maximum Strength, 9 Fluid Ounce Review Date: 2019/10/08 Store: Mountain Falls Product Description: ['For those with a passion for nail art, Mountain Falls Nail Polish Remover 100% Acetone is a manicure essential. This salon-strength formula quickly removes nail tips as well as glue and gel nail polish in a convenient dip-it container.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '0.5 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '9 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.07 x 2.6 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} Review Text: This product - 100% acetone nail polish remover - comes with an inner protective foil seal.

When I twisted the lid to open it, even with the seal intact, I could feel slight amounts of nail polish remover around the neck of the bottle and also smelled the remover.
Upon removing the seal, there is a transparent plastic seal that also needs to be removed prior to being able to dip a finger into this container.

Two of my family members used this product. I watched them dip their finger down into the brush area, twist the finger right and left. Then, move the finger up and down against the brush.
They say it's effective in removing the nail polish. Review Title: Effective nail polish remover. Strong acetone smell, even with intact protective seal. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pick & Pick (Gentle/metal allergy free material) Review Date: 2020/02/26 Store: MIND UP Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:4ec0f08a9d346155d134f855861e62]] This tooth cleaning tool - Pick & Pick - measures about 6-1/4 inches long.

At one end of the tool is a flexible, sharp pick, which I use to remove debris from in between my teeth.
At the other end of the tool is a flexible, flat-shaped pick, which I use to scrape unwanted particles and debris from between my gum lines and teeth.

The flat end of the pick is too flexible for me to remove most of the stubborn particles in the areas between my teeth and gums. I needed to hold my fingers as close to the flat end as possible to get good leverage. Even then, I couldn't remove the debris.

The sharp end of the pick works a bit better in removing debris from between my teeth; but for those debris that are really stuck, this pick can't get the debris out because the end keeps flexing.

This tool doesn't do a good job of removing resistant particles/debris from my teeth. Review Title: Too flexible to remove stubborn particles from between teeth or between teeth and gums. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Teeth Whitening Powder Kit 2.1oz Activated Charcoal Toothpaste Powder Teeth Whitener Remove Coffee Wine Tobacco Stains Gum Health and Fresh Breath with Toothbrush & Tongue Cleaner Review Date: 2020/03/12 Store: BeaGirl Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BeaGirl', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Weight': '2.1 Ounces', 'Flavor': 'Mint', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.93 x 2.24 inches; 2.1 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242892311'} Review Text: This Activated Charcoal Powder comes in a 2.1-oz round can.
A soft bristle toothbrush (with a wood handle) and a tongue scraper is also included.

After opening the cap, there is a tear-drop shaped "pick" that can be used to lift up the inner lid to reveal the charcoal powder.

This is my first time using activated charcoal as a means to whiten my teeth.

I wet the toothbrush, dipped it into the charcoal, and started brushing my teeth in my normal manner. Bits of the powder sprayed over various areas of the bathroom sink, and as I continued to brush and spit, the sink itself was covered with a combination of water/saliva/charcoal.
There was a taste of the powder (a bit bitter taste) on my tongue as I brushed.

Rinsing with water did not remove all the charcoal in my mouth; so I brushed again with toothpaste, and rinsed with more water. That did the trick.
It took a bit of time to clean up the mess I made.

The next occasions that I brushed using this activated charcoal, I did not brush as vigorously, and made less of a mess, as I adjusted to how to use the product.

In the last 3 weeks since using this, I have noticed the top part of a teeth (the top 5% of it) of the front four teeth are slightly brighter than the rest of the teeth.

The tongue scraper is a helpful addition to my dental hygiene routine. Review Title: Slight whitening at very tips of my teeth. A bit messy to use. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Clipper Set, GIDIBII Luxury 18 in 1 Stainless Steel Nail Clipper Kit, Manicure Pedicure Care Tools with Portable Travel Case Review Date: 2020/04/21 Store: GIDIBII Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GIDIBII', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Manicure Set', 'UPC': '799445199218', 'Manufacturer': 'GIDIBII'} Review Text: Short summary: I like a number of the instruments available in this set; they work well for my needs, and for the needs of our family members.
The case securely holds each instrument in its slot; but some instruments are tough to remove from their slots.

More details:

a) Case is soft to the touch and comfortable to hold. There is a tab that I press in to open the case; to close the case, I press both parts of the case together.

b) One compartment (the side with the tab) holds:
--- Nail File
Works well to smooth out my nails after I trimmed them.
--- Fingernail Clipper
The curved blades cut my nails well. The lever has square-shaped divots that give good
grip. It is a bit hard to rotate the lever around the pin; but, with continued use, it should
be easier to open and close the lever. There is no nail file attached to the clipper
--- Nose trimmer
I did not find this to be as good at cutting my nose hairs.
---.Cuticle nipper
This trims my cuticles well.
--- Eyebrow trimmer
This does a decent job in trimming eyebrow
--- Cuspidal/Obtuse push-type broach
I didn't have a need to use this; but several family members used this, and they say it
does an adequate job with their nail polish routine
--- Ear pick
I tried it, but I didn't like the sensation of it scraping against the inside of my ear.

c) The other compartment holds:
--- Toenail clipper
Curved blades cut my toenails well; however, it does not cut my big toenail because
that nail has too much fungus and is too thick. I used a different toenail clipper
recommended by my foot doctor.
--- Oblique nail clipper
I don't use this often for cutting my nail; but I like how easily it cuts the nails. Other
family members love it, and are more familiar in using it
--- Nail cleaning knife
I don't use this; others in my family say it works well to remove the debris under their nails.
--- Tweezers
My family members do not like this, because it doesn't open enough for them to use; so they went
back to using their preferred tweezers
--- Zig Zag callus remover
--- Oblique callus remover
--- Flat callus remover
note: so far, those of us with calluses (including me) do not have them so thick that
they need removal using these instruments.
--- Dead skin fork
a family member used it; she says it is quite useful in removing the loose skin right
around her cuticle area
--- Ear pick (has something like a serrated shape, perhaps)
I much prefer this ear pick; it felt more natural and is like what I used in the past.
--- Acne tool (one end with a circular loop; other end with a pick)
--- Acne tool (one end with a circular loop; other end with a scoop)
None of our family members currently have acne, so we haven't had a chance to try it;
but, we have similar instruments just like these, and those worked well when we've
needed to deal with our skin issues.

Lastly: I would have liked the case to be slightly larger, so that it is easier to remove all these instruments. When I removed all the instruments, some of which I used, others which my family members used, and then put the instruments back into the case, we couldn't get it to close. Finally, we removed the toenail clippers, and that easily closed the case.

Overall, this is a good manicure set, with instruments that I and/or my family members find to be very useful for our particular needs. Review Title: Has the tools needed to handle our face/hands/feet/skin issues. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Disposable Hair Cutting/Barber Capes for Home Haircutting Kit Men,Mercijzyasang Waterproof Disposable Shampoo/Hair Capes/Cover for Salon Barber Supplies Kits (50PCS) Review Date: 2020/08/07 Store: Mercijzyasang Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '13.7 x 11.93 x 2.05 inches; 2.05 Pounds'} Review Text: These 50 disposable capes (for hair cutting, hair styling, etc) come neatly folded in one package. All 50 capes were placed on top of each other. Then, it was folded lengthwise in half, then folded multiple times so that the resulting product fit neatly inside a rectangular-shaped plastic bag.

To get 1 cape, I unfold the entire 50 capes, get one cape, and fold the rest of the capes back in their original form. Once I got a cape, then re-folded the rest of the capes, I could not get it to fit back into the plastic bag. So, we put the capes in a grocery bag.

A cape measures 59 inches in length x 50-1/4 inches in width.

I smelled no odors emanating from these capes.

These capes are thin, fragile, see-through, and when a family member tied the top part of the cape around my neck (much like how a barber would do at the barber shop), the plastic "string" broke. So, with the next cape, he was more cautious in tying the string. We are able to carefully tie the string tightly around the neck, and then use clips to tie other parts of the cape around the back of my neck and shoulders. This way, I could get a hair cut, and not have hair falling down on my neck/shoulders/clothes.

These capes work best when I sit in a chair, have it on me and tied around my neck, then get a haircut. If I have the cape on, and the phone rings, and I need to get up from the chair and go to another room to answer the phone, the cape floats around randomly as I am moving. The cape gets tangled and wrinkled unto itself.

Overall, these are functional capes to use for when we get hair cuts at home. Review Title: Plastic cape that is fragile, thin, see-through. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Review Date: 2021/04/12 Store: Eye Love Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} Review Text: This activated charcoal soap bar comes in a product box that has a tamper-evident seal on the top and bottom part of the opening.

The soap has a mild scent, and while I don't know how to describe the scent, the product description says the scent consists of Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary. I did not find the scent to be pleasant nor unpleasant. When I am done showering, the scent disappears from my body soon after.

The soap bar does not have a smooth appearance; I can see various swirls and indentations through the surfaces of the soap. The bar is slippery to hold when wet.
The soap gives a generous, rich lather.

Although charcoal is one of the ingredients, this soap did not feel harsh on my skin. I've used other soaps with ingredients (sea salt granules, for instance) that I could feel on my skin as I was using the soap and exfoliated better than this soap. But, I do like how fresh and clean my body feels after using this soap.

I did not notice my skin being significantly better moisturized after using this bar of soap for the past 3 weeks versus how my skin felt before using the soap.

While the box shows stains from the soap (see pic I took), it does not leave stains on the shower stall once I was done rinsing off.

Lastly, expiration date can be found on the side of the box. Mine expires 01/2023. Review Title: Generous, rich lather; skin feels fresh and clean after use Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Electric Nail Drill, USB Nail File Machine for Acrylic Nails, Portable Manicure Pedicure Polishing Tool Efile Nail Supplies with Nail Drill Bits Set for Home and Salon Use Review Date: 2021/04/16 Store: Erhuida Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.13 x 2.56 inches; 8.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '788414221296'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:7e3241b19b2a32395c9925af72bef3d1]] This nail drill is lightweight, and has a power cord that I measured to be 6-feet, 3-1/2 inches long.
Note: no adapter in included for the USB end of the cord. I had to provide my own adapter in order to plug this power cord into the outlet.

Inserting a drill bit into the nail drill takes a little bit of effort, as does removing the bit from the drill. Once I have the bit properly seated in (i.e. I insert the bit into the drill, leaving 3-mm space, as shown in picture #6 at the upper left corner of the product description page), and start using the drill, the bit stays securely in place.

I like being able to increase / decrease the speed at which the drill bits rotate, using the speed control on the power cord. Some of us have thin nails, so they use a slower speed so that the bit doesn't put too much pressure on the nail. At its highest speed, this nail drill (along with the mandrel drill bit and sanding band) can reduce the thickness of our fungus toenails of our big toes.

The various drill bits (11 in total) provide enough variety to use on the many different fingernails and toenails of our family members.

Lastly, the user manual has excellent diagrams to describe the parts of the nail drill and some of the drill bits, as well as a step-by-step guide on how to operate this nail drill and the drill bit.

Overall, this nail drill and its drill bits works well for our fingernail and toenail needs Review Title: Works great for our toenail and fingernail needs. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce) Review Date: 2021/04/25 Store: Pure Extracts Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: This soap feels smooth to the touch.

I smell a strong floral / flowery scent. I could smell the scent even when the soap was still in the box. I could not smell much of a coconut scent. Once I am done using this soap during showering, the scent lingers for little while before disappearing.

The soap gives a creamy, rich lather.

My skin is typically of a dry nature, due in part to the hard water that is prevalent in our region. After using nearly all this soap in the past 3 weeks, I like that the soap helps my skin not be excessively dried out.

On the product description page, in the "important information" section, there were only 2 ingredients listed: Calendula Extract & Coconut Oil (100% Natural Ingrediants).

However, on the back of the product box, here are all the ingredients listed: sodium palmate, sodium palm, kernelate, aqua, glycerin, perfume, titanium dioxide, HEDP 60%, tinogard TT, tinopal CBS-X, extract of calendula and coconut oil. T.F.M. 76%

Manufactured date (Jan 2021) and used-before date (Dec 2023) is found on the back of the box, at the lower right area.

Overall, I like that this soap cleans my skin well, and I find the scent to be pleasant. Review Title: Strong floral scent; good for my dry skin; cleans well Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fog-free Dental Mirror and 4 Pieces of Stainless Steel Dental Pick Professional Oral Care Kit for Family including Dogs Oral Care Review Date: 2021/04/27 Store: Sunrise glow Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 2.4 x 1.3 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:cbac90e8387083ce10f04b521f9fab97]] These stainless steel dental picks are well-made. The ridged areas of the picks help give me a secure grip.

Before I use any of the picks, I sterilize them as follows:
a) I boil water, then place the picks in them for 10+ minutes.
b) Then, I lay them on a clean plate to cool.
c) Once the picks have cooled enough for me to handle, I choose a pick to take care of my teeth/gums.

I use the dental pick with the sharp hook at the end to remove stubborn food debris stuck between my teeth that my toothpick cannot remove.
I use the dental pick with an end that reminds me of a chisel to pick away at the plaque/tartar.

The dental mirror gives me a good view of the inside of my mouth, so I know what parts need to be worked on.
I breathed on the mirror, and it did not fog up. The light is bright.
note: the product description page makes no mention of what to do if the light doesn't work. There was no user guide included with this kit when I opened the package containing these picks and mirror.

Overall, I find this oral care kit to be useful in helping me take care of my gums and teeth at home in between the times I see my dentist. Review Title: Helps remove debris stuck between teeth, and deal with tartar/plaque Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Best Mom Ever French Milled Luxury Soap Set of 3 Bars (6.35oz) Review Date: 2021/06/18 Store: Jolitee Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Jolitee', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Jasmine, Rose, Chocolate, Chamomile, Verbena, Lemon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 2.7 x 1.6 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '659682147574'} Review Text: This 3-soap bar set has mild-to-moderate pleasing scents. I can really smell the lemon scent, while the rosewater jasmine variety is a bit more mild, and the lavender chamomile scent does not have as pronounced a scent as lemon.

I like how long-lasting a soap bar is. Even after a couple weeks use, most of the bar is still there. And, there is very little mushy remnants of soap left on the soap dish.

There is a good amount of lather, and I enjoy the smooth lather on my skin as I am using it.

Best of all, I like how clean my body gets with the use of this soap. And, my skin does not get dried out after using the soap. Review Title: Good lather, long lasting bar, smells wonderful Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Disposable Hair Cutting/Barber Capes for Home Haircutting Kit Men,Mercijzyasang Waterproof Disposable Shampoo/Hair Capes/Cover for Salon Barber Supplies Kits (50PCS) Mercijzyasang {'Package Dimensions': '13.7 x 11.93 x 2.05 inches; 2.05 Pounds'} These 50 disposable capes (for hair cutting, hair styling, etc) come neatly folded in one package. All 50 capes were placed on top of each other. Then, it was folded lengthwise in half, then folded multiple times so that the resulting product fit neatly inside a rectangular-shaped plastic bag.

To get 1 cape, I unfold the entire 50 capes, get one cape, and fold the rest of the capes back in their original form. Once I got a cape, then re-folded the rest of the capes, I could not get it to fit back into the plastic bag. So, we put the capes in a grocery bag.

A cape measures 59 inches in length x 50-1/4 inches in width.

I smelled no odors emanating from these capes.

These capes are thin, fragile, see-through, and when a family member tied the top part of the cape around my neck (much like how a barber would do at the barber shop), the plastic "string" broke. So, with the next cape, he was more cautious in tying the string. We are able to carefully tie the string tightly around the neck, and then use clips to tie other parts of the cape around the back of my neck and shoulders. This way, I could get a hair cut, and not have hair falling down on my neck/shoulders/clothes.

These capes work best when I sit in a chair, have it on me and tied around my neck, then get a haircut. If I have the cape on, and the phone rings, and I need to get up from the chair and go to another room to answer the phone, the cape floats around randomly as I am moving. The cape gets tangled and wrinkled unto itself.

Overall, these are functional capes to use for when we get hair cuts at home. Plastic cape that is fragile, thin, see-through. Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Eye Love {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} This activated charcoal soap bar comes in a product box that has a tamper-evident seal on the top and bottom part of the opening.

The soap has a mild scent, and while I don't know how to describe the scent, the product description says the scent consists of Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary. I did not find the scent to be pleasant nor unpleasant. When I am done showering, the scent disappears from my body soon after.

The soap bar does not have a smooth appearance; I can see various swirls and indentations through the surfaces of the soap. The bar is slippery to hold when wet.
The soap gives a generous, rich lather.

Although charcoal is one of the ingredients, this soap did not feel harsh on my skin. I've used other soaps with ingredients (sea salt granules, for instance) that I could feel on my skin as I was using the soap and exfoliated better than this soap. But, I do like how fresh and clean my body feels after using this soap.

I did not notice my skin being significantly better moisturized after using this bar of soap for the past 3 weeks versus how my skin felt before using the soap.

While the box shows stains from the soap (see pic I took), it does not leave stains on the shower stall once I was done rinsing off.

Lastly, expiration date can be found on the side of the box. Mine expires 01/2023. Generous, rich lather; skin feels fresh and clean after use Electric Nail Drill, USB Nail File Machine for Acrylic Nails, Portable Manicure Pedicure Polishing Tool Efile Nail Supplies with Nail Drill Bits Set for Home and Salon Use Erhuida {'Package Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.13 x 2.56 inches; 8.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '788414221296'} [[VIDEOID:7e3241b19b2a32395c9925af72bef3d1]] This nail drill is lightweight, and has a power cord that I measured to be 6-feet, 3-1/2 inches long.
Note: no adapter in included for the USB end of the cord. I had to provide my own adapter in order to plug this power cord into the outlet.

Inserting a drill bit into the nail drill takes a little bit of effort, as does removing the bit from the drill. Once I have the bit properly seated in (i.e. I insert the bit into the drill, leaving 3-mm space, as shown in picture #6 at the upper left corner of the product description page), and start using the drill, the bit stays securely in place.

I like being able to increase / decrease the speed at which the drill bits rotate, using the speed control on the power cord. Some of us have thin nails, so they use a slower speed so that the bit doesn't put too much pressure on the nail. At its highest speed, this nail drill (along with the mandrel drill bit and sanding band) can reduce the thickness of our fungus toenails of our big toes.

The various drill bits (11 in total) provide enough variety to use on the many different fingernails and toenails of our family members.

Lastly, the user manual has excellent diagrams to describe the parts of the nail drill and some of the drill bits, as well as a step-by-step guide on how to operate this nail drill and the drill bit.

Overall, this nail drill and its drill bits works well for our fingernail and toenail needs Works great for our toenail and fingernail needs. Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce) Pure Extracts {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} This soap feels smooth to the touch.

I smell a strong floral / flowery scent. I could smell the scent even when the soap was still in the box. I could not smell much of a coconut scent. Once I am done using this soap during showering, the scent lingers for little while before disappearing.

The soap gives a creamy, rich lather.

My skin is typically of a dry nature, due in part to the hard water that is prevalent in our region. After using nearly all this soap in the past 3 weeks, I like that the soap helps my skin not be excessively dried out.

On the product description page, in the "important information" section, there were only 2 ingredients listed: Calendula Extract & Coconut Oil (100% Natural Ingrediants).

However, on the back of the product box, here are all the ingredients listed: sodium palmate, sodium palm, kernelate, aqua, glycerin, perfume, titanium dioxide, HEDP 60%, tinogard TT, tinopal CBS-X, extract of calendula and coconut oil. T.F.M. 76%

Manufactured date (Jan 2021) and used-before date (Dec 2023) is found on the back of the box, at the lower right area.

Overall, I like that this soap cleans my skin well, and I find the scent to be pleasant. Strong floral scent; good for my dry skin; cleans well Fog-free Dental Mirror and 4 Pieces of Stainless Steel Dental Pick Professional Oral Care Kit for Family including Dogs Oral Care Sunrise glow {'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 2.4 x 1.3 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:cbac90e8387083ce10f04b521f9fab97]] These stainless steel dental picks are well-made. The ridged areas of the picks help give me a secure grip.

Before I use any of the picks, I sterilize them as follows:
a) I boil water, then place the picks in them for 10+ minutes.
b) Then, I lay them on a clean plate to cool.
c) Once the picks have cooled enough for me to handle, I choose a pick to take care of my teeth/gums.

I use the dental pick with the sharp hook at the end to remove stubborn food debris stuck between my teeth that my toothpick cannot remove.
I use the dental pick with an end that reminds me of a chisel to pick away at the plaque/tartar.

The dental mirror gives me a good view of the inside of my mouth, so I know what parts need to be worked on.
I breathed on the mirror, and it did not fog up. The light is bright.
note: the product description page makes no mention of what to do if the light doesn't work. There was no user guide included with this kit when I opened the package containing these picks and mirror.

Overall, I find this oral care kit to be useful in helping me take care of my gums and teeth at home in between the times I see my dentist. Helps remove debris stuck between teeth, and deal with tartar/plaque Best Mom Ever French Milled Luxury Soap Set of 3 Bars (6.35oz) Jolitee {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Jolitee', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Jasmine, Rose, Chocolate, Chamomile, Verbena, Lemon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 2.7 x 1.6 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '659682147574'} This 3-soap bar set has mild-to-moderate pleasing scents. I can really smell the lemon scent, while the rosewater jasmine variety is a bit more mild, and the lavender chamomile scent does not have as pronounced a scent as lemon.

I like how long-lasting a soap bar is. Even after a couple weeks use, most of the bar is still there. And, there is very little mushy remnants of soap left on the soap dish.

There is a good amount of lather, and I enjoy the smooth lather on my skin as I am using it.

Best of all, I like how clean my body gets with the use of this soap. And, my skin does not get dried out after using the soap. Good lather, long lasting bar, smells wonderful
prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Floss Picks Review Date: 2019/08/18 Store: BEOKREU Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 4.92 x 1.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '745679748517'} Review Text: This Floss Picks Dental Floss product contains a total of 200 dental floss. There are 4 separate bags. Each bag contains 50 dental floss. Each bag is resealable.

I have used these particular dental floss at various times of the day for the past 7 days. So far, not one dental floss has broken or become frayed. The floss moves between my teeth in a smooth manner.

This dental floss has no flavor.

I used these dental floss at home, and took a bag with me to work so that I can discreetly used them after eating lunch.

This dental floss works as intended to help me keep my teeth and gums healthy. Review Title: Dental floss moves easily between my teeth. None has broken or frayed so far. No flavor. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls 100% Acetone Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, Maximum Strength, 9 Fluid Ounce Review Date: 2019/10/08 Store: Mountain Falls Product Description: ['For those with a passion for nail art, Mountain Falls Nail Polish Remover 100% Acetone is a manicure essential. This salon-strength formula quickly removes nail tips as well as glue and gel nail polish in a convenient dip-it container.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '0.5 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '9 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.07 x 2.6 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} Review Text: This product - 100% acetone nail polish remover - comes with an inner protective foil seal.

When I twisted the lid to open it, even with the seal intact, I could feel slight amounts of nail polish remover around the neck of the bottle and also smelled the remover.
Upon removing the seal, there is a transparent plastic seal that also needs to be removed prior to being able to dip a finger into this container.

Two of my family members used this product. I watched them dip their finger down into the brush area, twist the finger right and left. Then, move the finger up and down against the brush.
They say it's effective in removing the nail polish. Review Title: Effective nail polish remover. Strong acetone smell, even with intact protective seal. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pick & Pick (Gentle/metal allergy free material) Review Date: 2020/02/26 Store: MIND UP Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:4ec0f08a9d346155d134f855861e62]] This tooth cleaning tool - Pick & Pick - measures about 6-1/4 inches long.

At one end of the tool is a flexible, sharp pick, which I use to remove debris from in between my teeth.
At the other end of the tool is a flexible, flat-shaped pick, which I use to scrape unwanted particles and debris from between my gum lines and teeth.

The flat end of the pick is too flexible for me to remove most of the stubborn particles in the areas between my teeth and gums. I needed to hold my fingers as close to the flat end as possible to get good leverage. Even then, I couldn't remove the debris.

The sharp end of the pick works a bit better in removing debris from between my teeth; but for those debris that are really stuck, this pick can't get the debris out because the end keeps flexing.

This tool doesn't do a good job of removing resistant particles/debris from my teeth. Review Title: Too flexible to remove stubborn particles from between teeth or between teeth and gums. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Teeth Whitening Powder Kit 2.1oz Activated Charcoal Toothpaste Powder Teeth Whitener Remove Coffee Wine Tobacco Stains Gum Health and Fresh Breath with Toothbrush & Tongue Cleaner Review Date: 2020/03/12 Store: BeaGirl Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BeaGirl', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Weight': '2.1 Ounces', 'Flavor': 'Mint', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.93 x 2.24 inches; 2.1 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242892311'} Review Text: This Activated Charcoal Powder comes in a 2.1-oz round can.
A soft bristle toothbrush (with a wood handle) and a tongue scraper is also included.

After opening the cap, there is a tear-drop shaped "pick" that can be used to lift up the inner lid to reveal the charcoal powder.

This is my first time using activated charcoal as a means to whiten my teeth.

I wet the toothbrush, dipped it into the charcoal, and started brushing my teeth in my normal manner. Bits of the powder sprayed over various areas of the bathroom sink, and as I continued to brush and spit, the sink itself was covered with a combination of water/saliva/charcoal.
There was a taste of the powder (a bit bitter taste) on my tongue as I brushed.

Rinsing with water did not remove all the charcoal in my mouth; so I brushed again with toothpaste, and rinsed with more water. That did the trick.
It took a bit of time to clean up the mess I made.

The next occasions that I brushed using this activated charcoal, I did not brush as vigorously, and made less of a mess, as I adjusted to how to use the product.

In the last 3 weeks since using this, I have noticed the top part of a teeth (the top 5% of it) of the front four teeth are slightly brighter than the rest of the teeth.

The tongue scraper is a helpful addition to my dental hygiene routine. Review Title: Slight whitening at very tips of my teeth. A bit messy to use. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Clipper Set, GIDIBII Luxury 18 in 1 Stainless Steel Nail Clipper Kit, Manicure Pedicure Care Tools with Portable Travel Case Review Date: 2020/04/21 Store: GIDIBII Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GIDIBII', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Manicure Set', 'UPC': '799445199218', 'Manufacturer': 'GIDIBII'} Review Text: Short summary: I like a number of the instruments available in this set; they work well for my needs, and for the needs of our family members.
The case securely holds each instrument in its slot; but some instruments are tough to remove from their slots.

More details:

a) Case is soft to the touch and comfortable to hold. There is a tab that I press in to open the case; to close the case, I press both parts of the case together.

b) One compartment (the side with the tab) holds:
--- Nail File
Works well to smooth out my nails after I trimmed them.
--- Fingernail Clipper
The curved blades cut my nails well. The lever has square-shaped divots that give good
grip. It is a bit hard to rotate the lever around the pin; but, with continued use, it should
be easier to open and close the lever. There is no nail file attached to the clipper
--- Nose trimmer
I did not find this to be as good at cutting my nose hairs.
---.Cuticle nipper
This trims my cuticles well.
--- Eyebrow trimmer
This does a decent job in trimming eyebrow
--- Cuspidal/Obtuse push-type broach
I didn't have a need to use this; but several family members used this, and they say it
does an adequate job with their nail polish routine
--- Ear pick
I tried it, but I didn't like the sensation of it scraping against the inside of my ear.

c) The other compartment holds:
--- Toenail clipper
Curved blades cut my toenails well; however, it does not cut my big toenail because
that nail has too much fungus and is too thick. I used a different toenail clipper
recommended by my foot doctor.
--- Oblique nail clipper
I don't use this often for cutting my nail; but I like how easily it cuts the nails. Other
family members love it, and are more familiar in using it
--- Nail cleaning knife
I don't use this; others in my family say it works well to remove the debris under their nails.
--- Tweezers
My family members do not like this, because it doesn't open enough for them to use; so they went
back to using their preferred tweezers
--- Zig Zag callus remover
--- Oblique callus remover
--- Flat callus remover
note: so far, those of us with calluses (including me) do not have them so thick that
they need removal using these instruments.
--- Dead skin fork
a family member used it; she says it is quite useful in removing the loose skin right
around her cuticle area
--- Ear pick (has something like a serrated shape, perhaps)
I much prefer this ear pick; it felt more natural and is like what I used in the past.
--- Acne tool (one end with a circular loop; other end with a pick)
--- Acne tool (one end with a circular loop; other end with a scoop)
None of our family members currently have acne, so we haven't had a chance to try it;
but, we have similar instruments just like these, and those worked well when we've
needed to deal with our skin issues.

Lastly: I would have liked the case to be slightly larger, so that it is easier to remove all these instruments. When I removed all the instruments, some of which I used, others which my family members used, and then put the instruments back into the case, we couldn't get it to close. Finally, we removed the toenail clippers, and that easily closed the case.

Overall, this is a good manicure set, with instruments that I and/or my family members find to be very useful for our particular needs. Review Title: Has the tools needed to handle our face/hands/feet/skin issues. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Disposable Hair Cutting/Barber Capes for Home Haircutting Kit Men,Mercijzyasang Waterproof Disposable Shampoo/Hair Capes/Cover for Salon Barber Supplies Kits (50PCS) Review Date: 2020/08/07 Store: Mercijzyasang Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '13.7 x 11.93 x 2.05 inches; 2.05 Pounds'} Review Text: These 50 disposable capes (for hair cutting, hair styling, etc) come neatly folded in one package. All 50 capes were placed on top of each other. Then, it was folded lengthwise in half, then folded multiple times so that the resulting product fit neatly inside a rectangular-shaped plastic bag.

To get 1 cape, I unfold the entire 50 capes, get one cape, and fold the rest of the capes back in their original form. Once I got a cape, then re-folded the rest of the capes, I could not get it to fit back into the plastic bag. So, we put the capes in a grocery bag.

A cape measures 59 inches in length x 50-1/4 inches in width.

I smelled no odors emanating from these capes.

These capes are thin, fragile, see-through, and when a family member tied the top part of the cape around my neck (much like how a barber would do at the barber shop), the plastic "string" broke. So, with the next cape, he was more cautious in tying the string. We are able to carefully tie the string tightly around the neck, and then use clips to tie other parts of the cape around the back of my neck and shoulders. This way, I could get a hair cut, and not have hair falling down on my neck/shoulders/clothes.

These capes work best when I sit in a chair, have it on me and tied around my neck, then get a haircut. If I have the cape on, and the phone rings, and I need to get up from the chair and go to another room to answer the phone, the cape floats around randomly as I am moving. The cape gets tangled and wrinkled unto itself.

Overall, these are functional capes to use for when we get hair cuts at home. Review Title: Plastic cape that is fragile, thin, see-through. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Review Date: 2021/04/12 Store: Eye Love Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} Review Text: This activated charcoal soap bar comes in a product box that has a tamper-evident seal on the top and bottom part of the opening.

The soap bar does not have a smooth appearance; I can see various swirls and indentations through the surfaces of the soap. The bar is slippery to hold when wet.
The soap gives a generous, rich lather.

Although charcoal is one of the ingredients, this soap did not feel harsh on my skin. I've used other soaps with ingredients (sea salt granules, for instance) that I could feel on my skin as I was using the soap and exfoliated better than this soap. But, I do like how fresh and clean my body feels after using this soap.

I did not notice my skin being significantly better moisturized after using this bar of soap for the past 3 weeks versus how my skin felt before using the soap.

Lastly, expiration date can be found on the side of the box. Mine expires 01/2023. Overall, this nail drill and its drill bits works well for our fingernail and toenail needs Review Title: Works great for our toenail and fingernail needs. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce) Review Date: 2021/04/25 Store: Pure Extracts Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: This soap feels smooth to the touch.

Review Title: Good lather, long lasting bar, smells wonderful Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed satisfaction with several products in their purchase history. They particularly appreciate the effectiveness of dental floss, noting its smooth operation and durability. The nail polish remover was also highlighted for its strong performance and convenience. The activated charcoal face soap provided a rich lather and left the user feeling fresh and clean, while the nail drill and dental care kit received praise for their utility in home grooming. The soap bars from one set were appreciated for their pleasant scents, effective cleaning, and longevity.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user encountered some disappointments with several products. The tooth cleaning tool was criticized for being too flexible, making it ineffective at removing stubborn debris. The disposable hair cutting capes were described as fragile and difficult to manage, with the plastic ties breaking easily. The activated charcoal powder was messy to use, requiring extensive cleanup after each application. Additionally, the nail clipper set's instruments were noted as difficult to remove, and some family members found certain tools unfit for their needs, such as the tweezers and nose trimmer.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user's shopping experience reflects a mix of satisfaction and frustration. Positively, they have found effective dental products, soaps, and grooming tools that meet their needs, offering functionality and good quality. However, they have faced challenges with the usability of certain items, such as the tooth tool's flexibility, the fragility of the hair cutting capes, and the inconvenience posed by certain instruments in the manicure set. While many products performed well, a few did not meet expectations, highlighting the variability in their experiences.

target_interaction.title: Cleans skin well; mild floral scent; 50+ ingredients
target_interaction.text:
This amino acid shower gel has a thin consistency, but is not as runny as water.
The gel has a silver-white color, with a mild floral scent.

The gel lathers up decent.
I like how clean I feel after applying it to my body and then rinsing it off. The scent does not linger on my body for long, once I have finished showering.

After a couple of weeks use, on a daily basis, I did not feel my dry skin being less dried, nor moisturized for a long time (albeit, this is a short time testing period).

The product description page mentions that this shower gel is "natural and organic"; yet, I do not see any certification seals on the product bottle.

The product page also says this shower gel is indicated for sensitive skin type; but, it has an astounding 50+ ingredients, including cocamidopropyl betaine.

Expiration date is on the bottom of the bottle. Mine expires 01/05/2024.

Overall, this shower gel does the one thing well that I want a body wash to do - clean my skin.
target_interaction.title_meta: ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts
